name: Afterhigh
description: A game I made in a week for Dungeon Crawler Game Jam 2021. It was my first time I was making a game for a game jam and actualy submitting it and kinda stressful because I haven't got that much time and unity works really slow for me. But i finnaly got it done, haven't done much on the level part tho... And I think there is a bug that your mouse is stuck in the menu so you can't exit so you gotta exit the game the hard way(alt+f4). Still, it was pretty fun to make and I hope you enjoy it too.  I would really appreciate if you support my game and leave a positive comment because otherwise I won't have enough motivation to finish the game. And also...beware the enemy...
